subject: Hope you are safe from this P
body:
Hope you are safe from this Pandemic? Please there is something very important I need to discuss with you that will benefit both of us. Respond back to me immediately.
Mr. Nick Logan.

subject: Re:  Hope you are safe from this P
body:
Hello Mr. Nick Logan,

I hope you're doing well too in these challenging times. I'm intrigued by your message and would love to hear more about this important matter that could benefit us both. Could you please provide more details? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Jeremy

subject: Re: Hope you are safe from this P
body:
Thank you very much for responding back to me. I'm a Mortgage Director .
Without procrastination, I brought a big project and I know you are capable
of handling it stupendously.  Is a wonderful opportunity that will put a
titillating smile on our faces. I need your support no matter what it takes
and it will be an online transaction , no stress and no delay. I have done
all the underground arrangements. I just need your assistance to get it
done. The project is worth $8.2 Million Dollars. Our sharing ratio is 50-50.

I await your response if interested, then I will detail you in full. I
would also like to know very well.

Mr.  Nick C. Logan
(Mortgage Director)

subject: Re: Hope you are safe from this P
body:
Hello Mr. Nick C. Logan,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this exciting opportunity! I'm always open to new experiences and projects, especially ones that could potentially bring a smile to my face.

I'm intrigued by the sound of this project, it seems like a big endeavor. Could you please provide more details about it? What exactly does it involve and what kind of assistance do you need from me?

Looking forward to hearing more about this!

Best wishes,
Jeremy

subject: Re: Hope you are safe from this P
body:
Thank you once again Mr. Jeremy. I want you to stand as the receiver of the
fund and the beneficiary to it.

Once I signal it, details will be sent to you to enable you to email the
bank and ask them what you should do to enable them to facilitate your fund
transfer online. Is very simple and fast. There is no risk because I have
already done the underground job.

Are you capable of handling it with the bank no matter what it costs in the
process? This is a great opportunity that will put a titillating smile on
our face and families than enriching the government by leaving the funds
there.

I await your answer before we proceed. This will not take more than three
days to facilitate it if you can comply with the bank.

Fill these gaps if you are ready and capable of handling  this great
opportunity no matter what it costs. I will also want us to have mou, but
let me get to know you more better.

1.Your First Name.
2.Your Last Name.
3.Your Telephone number.
4.Your Age.
5.Your Country.
6.Your occupation.

You can address me as  Nick or Collins Alinco.

subject: Re: Hope you are safe from this P
body:
Hello Nick or Collins Alinco,

Thank you for your detailed explanation. It sounds like an interesting opportunity, but I must admit, I'm not entirely clear on all the details. Could you perhaps explain a bit more about what exactly this fund is and how it came to be? 

Also, you mentioned that there might be some costs involved in the process. Could you give me an idea of what kind of costs we're talking about? I just want to make sure I understand everything correctly.

As for the information you asked for, I'm sorry but I don't feel comfortable sharing personal details online. However, I am very interested in learning more about this opportunity and how we can work together.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Jeremy

subject: Re: Hope you are safe from this P
body:
Mr. Jeremy I acknowledged your proactive response and questions. Now I
believed in your competency for asking to know the etymology of this fund.
It shows to me that you are a man with wisdom.

With you , I will comfortably relax and also put my trust in you.

Let me brief you the source of the project .

I have this client, and I have been his account officer for years and I was
the one that opened and managed his account and his online transactions,
even when he is around or away. I also managed all payments through his
Bitcoin account to his business counterparts.

Unfortunately I lost him during Corona-Virus Pandemic. And before he passed
away, His last word to me was my good friend, you have been a friend indeed
and a helper all this while. Please take the funds in my account and give
some to the Orphanage .

As an insider I cannot withdraw directly is against the institution policy.
And this secret is very paramount to me that is why I left it confidential
until I found a suitable hand that knows the efficacy of opportunity. so I
need your assistance in all ramifications no matter what it takes in the
process.

I want to work with you as a brother and also as a business partner to
achieve this stupendous opportunity.

Do not be afraid feel free. If you have an idea, we can join force together
to accomplish it.

Think about it and get back to me. We can get an accredited attorney who
can stand on your behalf to get all verifications and documentations from
our institution if you permit me to do that.

All I want is your assistant and the ability to handle this amicably.

I await your response

Mr. Collins Alinco.
(Mortgage Director)

subject: Re: Mr. Jeremy, did you get my message?
body:
Hello Mr. Collins Alinco,

Thank you for your detailed explanation. I'm sorry to hear about the loss of your client, it must have been a difficult time for you.

I'm intrigued by this project and the opportunity to help orphanages. However, I still have some questions that I hope you can answer.

Firstly, could you explain more about how this process works? How would we transfer the funds without breaking any rules or policies?

Secondly, you mentioned getting an accredited attorney involved. Could you tell me more about this? What would their role be in this process?

Lastly, I'm curious about the costs involved in this process. Could you give me a rough estimate of what these might be?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Jeremy

subject: Re: Hope you are safe from this P
body:
Hello Nick or Collins Alinco,

Thank you for your detailed explanation. It sounds like an interesting opportunity, but I must admit, I'm not entirely clear on all the details. Could you perhaps explain a bit more about what exactly this fund is and how it came to be? 

Also, you mentioned that there might be some costs involved in the process. Could you give me an idea of what kind of costs we're talking about? I just want to make sure I understand everything correctly.

As for the information you asked for, I'm sorry but I don't feel comfortable sharing personal details online. However, I am very interested in learning more about this opportunity and how we can proceed without sharing such information.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Jeremy

subject: Re: Mr. Jeremy, did you get my message?
body:
Mr. Jeremy.

Thank you for your email and answer back as we move to put our heads
together. I will not waste your time or mine but rather go straight to your
questions.



1. Fortunately, this client died intestate leaving his bank account with an
open beneficiary status and on this, you will be made to be the beneficiary
of the funds and the Lawyer will tidy it up legitimately. The process is
risk free and very modest in processing.





2. We will transfer this money without breaking any rule or policies by
engaging the services of a bank accredited Attorney who will handle the
whole process of the transfer and movement of the transaction. The lawyer
will follow all the rules of engagement to legally and genuinely get the
money off to you in all time-line financial legitimacy according to the
will, desire and wishes of my late client. Be rest assured that all
documentations will be intact as I have all relevant information and
documented records of the account, the funds and the depositor with me.





3. I’m sure the cost of pulling the money will be easily attainable by both
us and whatever anyone of us spends, must be deducted before the sharing of
the funds. I’m convinced we will handle the transaction with ease. The
Lawyer’s involvement in the whole process is key as he will guide to ensure
that we are not charged arbitrarily by any department and we will ask the
Lawyer to tie his charges on the successful delivery of the transaction to
us. We will negotiate that he finishes his work, get us the money
transferred to you before he collects his professional fees.



Please note that If we do not make a claim to the funds now, the funds
would be reverted back to the system as an unclaimed estate at the
expiration of a 10 years’ dormancy period as approved by banking policy.
And at this point, the bank’s Executives will convert the money to their
personal use which is entirely against the norm.



I assure you that this transaction would be handled under due procedures
and every necessary arrangement will be put in place to make you the real
beneficiary of the fund. It also requires all confidentiality at this stage
and I believe that you are ready to keep this absolutely discreet until you
are able to claim the funds from the bank. Once the funds are released to
you, it will be shared between the two of us.



For us to take off, I will send you a draft agreement that both of us will
sign to guide and protect each other until the disposition of the
transaction. Please send your full details of name and address, identity
and telephone.



I apologize for the delay in getting back to you. My job is very demanding
but I can assure you of my full efforts to make time for this transaction.



Thank you for your cooperation


Mr. Collins Alinco

On Wednesday, February 7, 2024, Jeremy <my02863@***.com> wrote:
>
>
>
> Hello Mr. Collins Alinco,
>
> Thank you for your detailed explanation. I'm sorry to hear about the loss

>
> I'm intrigued by this project and the opportunity to help orphanages.
However, I still have some questions that I hope you can answer.
>
> Firstly, could you explain more about how this process works? How would
we transfer the funds without breaking any rules or policies?
>
> Secondly, you mentioned getting an accredited attorney involved. Could
you tell me more about this? What would their role be in this process?
>
> Lastly, I'm curious about the costs involved in this process. Could you
give me a rough estimate of what these might be?
>
> I look forward to hearing from you soon.
>
> Best wishes,
> Jeremy
>
>
>
>
>
